page.title: 09GOVERNMENT BEULAH - GARTH
page.content: Community Councils of Treflys and Llanlleonfel deal with local matters such as footpaths, siting of roadsigns and approval of planning permission for dwellings. Members drawn from local community. District Council of Borough of Breck- nock.(Main office at Builth, regional office at Brecon) adminster whole area for rating, planning permission,refuse collection, and passing of bye-laws. Powys County Council, with elected members for each district deals with Education, Social Services, Highways, and Libraries from headquarters at Llandrindod Wells. Parliamentary Constituency of Brecon and Radnor which has (1985) elected an SDP and Liberal Alliance member after many years as a Labour Constituency.
